review_text: Hi, this platform for learning is very helpful and also teachers are all good overall the experience is good but the one thing which is the reason for decreasing experience is , when I watch recorded lecture I can't ask doubt and also timeline is showing 'no slides yet' so I request to solve both of the issues and especially focus on doubt section. Thankyou sir after this, in latest version the same problem is coming. please sir solve it. So I can ask doubt. thankyou

Zero Stars: Unacceptable Service and Logistics Do NOT consider PW. My experience with getting study materials has been a disaster. First, the delivery partners are unprofessional—they failed to deliver the books, leading to a Returned to Origin (RTO). Second, the customer support is unresponsive and fails to solve the problem. I've been waiting weeks, with no tracking ID or accurate dispatch date, even after multiple follow-ups. They just make empty promises. Problems not solved. Avoid PW

PW’s support for Bihar Board English Medium students is weaker compared to CBSE. AI Guru answers are often CBSE-oriented, books don’t cover Bihar Board–specific topics, and teacher quality for Bihar Board classes is not at the same level. Please improve board-focused content, book quality, and teacher expertise so Bihar Board English Medium students also get complete and equal preparation.”
